title: Accidents
description: My dad, sister and I were all in a car driving at night. Someone t-bones us on the driver side. My dad, bleeding, wasn't responsive. I dragged him over to the passenger side and tool the wheel to make my way to the hospital. Someone how cares still work in you dreams.

title: Lucid Nightmare
description: I was sleep walking in this nightmare and couldnt wake up as an intruder came in through the window and started stabbing the wall. It was terrifying!

title: Monster
description: Last night, I had a nightmare that I was being chased by a group of monsters. They were chasing me through the streets and I was terrified. I kept running, but I couldn't escape them. Eventually, they caught up to me and I woke up feeling scared and shaken.

title: Dark Forest
description: In my nightmare, I was in a dark and creepy forest. I was lost and couldn't find my way out. As I walked through the forest, I heard strange noises and saw strange shadows. I felt terrified and alone.

title: Attacked!
description: I had a nightmare that I was being attacked by a group of people. They were trying to hurt me and I was powerless to stop them. I woke up feeling panicked and vulnerable.

title: Falling
description: I had a nightmare that I was falling from a great height. I was plummeting towards the ground, feeling terrified and helpless. When I woke up, my heart was racing and I was covered in sweat.
